member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription
member.summary: Description of a certificate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.FromCertificate(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)
member.summary: Creates a certificate description from a certificate (by code).
member.param: Certificate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.FromKeyVault(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a certificate description from Key Vault.
member.param: The Key Vault URL.
The name of the certificate in Key Vault.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.FromBase64Encoded(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a certificate description from a Base64 encoded value.
member.param: Base64 encoded certificate value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.FromPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a certificate description from path on disk.
member.param: Path where to find the certificate file.
Certificate password.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.FromStoreWithThumprint(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName)
member.summary: Creates a certificate description from a thumbprint and store location (Certificate Manager on Windows, for instance).
member.param: Certificate thumbprint.
Store location where to find the certificate.
Store name where to find the certificate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.FromStoreWithThumbprint(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName)
member.summary: Creates a certificate description from a thumbprint and store location (Certificate Manager on Windows, for instance).
member.param: Certificate thumbprint.
Store location where to find the certificate.
Store name where to find the certificate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.FromStoreWithDistinguishedName(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName)
member.summary: Creates a certificate description from a certificate distinguished name (such as CN=name) and store location (Certificate Manager on Windows, for instance).
member.param: Certificate distinguished named.
Store location where to find the certificate.
Store name where to find the certificate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.SourceType
member.summary: Type of the source of the certificate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.Container
member.summary:
Container in which to find the certificate.
If equals , then the container is the Key Vault base URL.
If equals , then this value is not used.
If equals , then this value is the path on disk where to find the certificate.
If equals , or , then this value is the path to the certificate in the cert store, for instance CurrentUser/My.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.KeyVaultUrl
member.summary: URL of the Key Vault, for instance https://msidentitywebsamples.vault.azure.net.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.CertificateStorePath
member.summary: Certificate store path, for instance "CurrentUser/My".
member.remarks: This property should only be used in conjunction with DistinguishedName or Thumbprint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.CertificateDistinguishedName
member.summary: Certificate distinguished name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.KeyVaultCertificateName
member.summary: Name of the certificate in Key Vault.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.CertificateThumbprint
member.summary: Certificate thumbprint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.CertificateDiskPath
member.summary: Path on disk to the certificate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.CertificatePassword
member.summary: Path on disk to the certificate password.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.Base64EncodedValue
member.summary: Base64 encoded certificate value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.X509KeyStorageFlags
member.summary: Defines where and how to import the private key of an X.509 certificate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.ReferenceOrValue
member.summary: Reference to the certificate or value.

list.item: If equals , then the reference is the name of the certificate in Key Vault (maybe the version?).
If equals , then this value is the base 64 encoded certificate itself.
If equals , then this value is the password to access the certificate (if needed).
If equals , this value is the distinguished name.
If equals , this value is the thumbprint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription.Certificate
member.summary: The certificate, either provided directly in code or loaded from the description.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateSource
member.summary: Source for a certificate.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateSource.Certificate
member.summary: Certificate itself.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateSource.KeyVault
member.summary: From an Azure Key Vault.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateSource.Base64Encoded
member.summary: Base64 encoded string directly from the configuration.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateSource.Path
member.summary: From local path on disk.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateSource.StoreWithThumbprint
member.summary: From the certificate store, described by its thumbprint.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateSource.StoreWithDistinguishedName
member.summary: From the certificate store, described by its distinguished name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.DefaultCertificateLoader
P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.DefaultCertificateLoader.UserAssignedManagedIdentityClientId
member.summary: User assigned managed identity client ID (as opposed to system assigned managed identity) See https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-identities-azure-resources/how-to-manage-ua-identity-portal.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.DefaultCertificateLoader.LoadIfNeeded(Microsoft.Identity.Web.CertificateDescription)
member.summary: Load the certificate from the description, if needed.
member.param: Description of the certificate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.DefaultCertificateLoader.LoadFromKeyVault(System.String,System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags)
member.summary: Load a certificate from Key Vault, including the private key.
member.param: URL of Key Vault.
Name of the certificate.
Defines where and how to import the private key of an X.509 certificate.
member.remarks: This code is inspired by Heath Stewart's code in: https://github.com/heaths/azsdk-sample-getcert/blob/master/Program.cs#L46-L82.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.DefaultCertificateLoader.FindCertificateByCriterium(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType,System.String)
member.summary: Find a certificate by criteria.

member.summary: Load the certificate from the description, if needed.
member.param: Description of the certificate.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants

member.summary: LoginHint. Represents the preferred_username claim in the ID token.

member.summary: DomainHint. Determined by the tenant Id.

member.summary: Claims. Determined from the signed-in user.

member.summary: Bearer. Predominant type of access token used with OAuth 2.0.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetMsalAccountId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the account identifier for an MSAL.NET account from a .
member.param: Claims principal.
member.returns: A string corresponding to an account identifier as defined in .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetObjectId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the unique object ID associated with the .
member.param: The from which to retrieve the unique object ID.
member.remarks: This method returns the object ID both in case the developer has enabled or not claims mapping.
member.returns: Unique object ID of the identity, or null if it cannot be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetTenantId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the Tenant ID associated with the .
member.param: The from which to retrieve the tenant ID.
member.returns: Tenant ID of the identity, or null if it cannot be found.
member.remarks: This method returns the tenant ID both in case the developer has enabled or not claims mapping.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetLoginHint(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the login-hint associated with a .
member.param: Identity for which to complete the login-hint.
member.returns: The login hint for the identity, or null if it cannot be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetDomainHint(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the domain-hint associated with an identity.
member.param: Identity for which to compute the domain-hint.
member.returns: The domain hint for the identity, or null if it cannot be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetDisplayName(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Get the display name for the signed-in user, from the .
member.param: Claims about the user/account.
member.returns: A string containing the display name for the user, as determined by Azure AD (v1.0) and Microsoft identity platform (v2.0) tokens, or null if the claims cannot be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetUserFlowId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the user flow ID associated with the .
member.param: The from which to retrieve the user flow ID.
member.returns: User flow ID of the identity, or null if it cannot be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetHomeObjectId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the Home Object ID associated with the .
member.param: The from which to retrieve the sub claim.
member.returns: Home Object ID (sub) of the identity, or null if it cannot be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetHomeTenantId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the Home Tenant ID associated with the .
member.param: The from which to retrieve the sub claim.
member.returns: Home Tenant ID (sub) of the identity, or null if it cannot be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetNameIdentifierId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the NameIdentifierId associated with the .
member.param: The from which to retrieve the NameIdentifierId claim.
member.returns: Name identifier ID of the identity, or null if it cannot be found.
